name: David
title: Its an amazing bike which gives classy looks. Its engine is really awesome, very comfortable and it has a good resale value. Coming to mileage, it gives average of 44 kmpl. If you are looking for a good bike go for it. Regular servicing is must..Royal enfield is my favorite & only one of the one brand. 5. Best exhaust sounds, best riding experience.
